name: XY
description:
Antoine live with his parents with a father homophobic. He has to choice to speak or not at his parents. During the game, you have to do choices to decide his life.

You have the power to choose his destiny !

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game is made in collaboration with the game called "XX", and takes place in the same univers.
